channel.title: Posts on Shaswata Roy
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Shaswata Roy

item.title: Queues and Genes
item.description: Queueing theory provides a mathematical framework for analyzing systems where entities wait for service. In biological systems, particularly gene transcription, this framework elegantly models the stochastic processes governing RNA production.

item.title: Waddington Landscape
item.description: In this post, I reflect on recent experiences and share insights from my journey. Thank you for reading and supporting my blog!
